borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<p><b>CAR PARKING</b>&nbsp;</p><p>The proposed parking arrangement would be inadequate and impractical,
resulting in the existing and proposed dwellings sharing a singular driveway
and one dropped kerb, which could cause issues regarding the access of vehicles
and obstruction. As such, the proposed development is contrary to the following
policies:&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Policies T6, T6.1, and Table.10.3 of
the&nbsp;London Plan (March 2021);&nbsp;</li><li>Policy BR9 of the&nbsp;Local
Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March
2011);&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Policy DMT 2 of the London
Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan 2037&nbsp;(Regulation 19
Submission Version, December 2021).</li></ul>

<p><b>DESIGN&nbsp;</b></p><p>The proposal&nbsp;by reason of its position, scale, and massing would
greatly reduce the existing openness&nbsp;on the corner,&nbsp;which provides
relief from the built up nature of the street and contributes positively to the
character of the area.&nbsp;This is considered to generate harm upon the
character and appearance of the site and would take away from the distinctive
qualities of the Becontree Estate which is a non-designated heritage
asset.&nbsp;As such, the proposed development is contrary to the following
policies:&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Paragraphs 126, 130, 134,&nbsp;and 203&nbsp;of the
National Planning Policy Framework&nbsp;(September 2023);</li><li>Policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (March
2021);</li><li>Policies CP2 and CP3 of the Local Development
Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);&nbsp;</li><li>Policies BP2 and&nbsp;BP11&nbsp;of
the&nbsp;Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan
Document (DPD) (March 2011).</li></ul>
subdivision_of_building: The proposal would be developed on the large side garden area which is currently unused.
description: Construction of a two storey dwelling house (2 x bedrooms) with associated waste/refuse, car parking, electric vehicle charging points, cycle storage and amenity space.

constraints_details.result: 41 Nuneaton Road, Dagenham, Barking And Dagenham, RM9 6DX
